sentence: In early trading on Friday, shares of Dow topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.3%.
Year to date, Dow registers a 9.6% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Procter & Gamble, trading down 0.6%.
Procter & Gamble is showing a gain of 30.1% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Visa, trading down 0.5%, and Goldman Sachs Group, trading up 1.0% on the day.
